column6:
DECIMATION Tie-In!,2006,2
Questions: What is the bizarre secret of Singularity Investigations and their boss, Mr. Tryp? Has Jamie Madrox turned homicidal? Who is Layla Miller and how does she know stuff? Who is Gloria Santiago and what's going on with her sister? Will Rahne give in to her temptation to kick Monet's butt? Can X-Factor's investigation of the "Decimation" possibly yield the mystery of the HOUSE OF M? Read X-Factor #2 and learn the answer to all, some, and possibly none of these questions!

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller:Ryan Sook | colorist:Jose Villarrubia
